author: CNN Staff, CNN
title: United flight delayed after plainclothes pilot's rant
text:
Story highlights Passengers said on social media that they felt the pilot might be unstable United arranged for new pilot; flight was delayed about 2 hours, airline says (CNN) A flight out of Austin, Texas, was delayed after a pilot behaved in a way that caused passengers to believe she was mentally unstable, a United Airlines spokesman said Sunday. 
The pilot, whom CNN is not naming, boarded the plane in street clothes and began speaking to passengers over the intercom, spokesman Charlie Hobart said. Passengers on Saturday's San Francisco-bound flight took to social media to express concerns after the pilot spoke to them about her divorce and the presidential election, among other issues.
